    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/72089</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>72089</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140087</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Prosti pad</string>
            <string language="en">Free fall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geben Sie Fall frei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Libérez la chute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Livre a queda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Liberi la caduta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελεύθερη πτώση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Libere la caída</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izpeljava, da je pospešek vseh prosto padajočih teles enak za vse ne glede na njihovo maso.</string>
            <string language="en">Determining that all free-fall object regardless of their mass have the same acceleration due to the gravity - g constant.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacijski pospešek</string>
            <string language="en">gravity acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">konstanta g</string>
            <string language="en">g constant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prosti pad</string>
            <string language="en">free-fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmung, daß alle Fallnachricht unabhängig 
davon ihre Masse die gleiche Beschleunigung wegen der Schwerkraft - g 
Konstante haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminant que tout l'objet de chute libre 
indépendamment de leur masse ont la même accélération due à la 
pesanteur - constante de g.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando que todo o objeto do free-fall não 
obstante sua massa tem o mesmo acceleration  devido à gravidade - 
constante de g.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinando che tutto l'oggetto di caduta libera
senza riguardo alla loro massa abbia la stessa accelerazione dovuto la
gravità - costante di g.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοριστικός ότι όλο free-fall το αντικείμενο 
ανεξάρτητα από τη μάζα τους έχει την ίδια ταχύτητα λόγω στη 
βαρύτητα - σταθερά γ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinándose que todo el objeto de la 
caída libre sin importar su masa tiene la misma aceleración  debido a 
la gravedad - constante de g.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraftbeschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">g Konstante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">freier Fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">accélération de pesanteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">constante de g</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chute libre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acceleration da gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">constante de g</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">free-fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">accelerazione di gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">costante di g</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caduta libera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταχύτητα βαρύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σταθερά γ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">free-fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aceleración de la gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">constante de g</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">caída libre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
